## workshop_flexdashboards

workshop_flexdashboards supports an [Rfun](https://rfun.library.duke.edu) [DVS](https://library.duke.edu/data/) workshop for learning how to layout dashboards, add interactivity such as filters and **linked brushing** via HTML Widgets, `crosstalk`


[Demonstration](https://rfun-flexdashboards.netlify.com/)

[Rstudio.cloud](https://rstudio.cloud/spaces/11680/projects) -- Practice code and preconfigured RStudio workspace
